fields.name: The Cave of the Mind
fields.description: You should know better than to drink strange potions. Now you have to survive a cave full of creatures, some magical and some not so magical. And who, or what, is the Mind?
fields.intro_text: As you were leaving the Main Hall one evening, you encountered a short little man who beckoned you to see what he was holding. It turned out to be a grail which contained a bubbling green liquid. In a strange low voice he said, "Most adventures are for normal adventurers, but you are special. Drink this and you will be transported to the most challenging adventure you could imagine. DANGER! TREASURE! GLORY! Do you dare try and conquer...The Cave of the Mind!?! Ha-ha-ha-ha!" With a sly wink, he then hands you the grail. You study it for a moment, then glance back at the little man...But he has vanished! Never being weak on courage, you raise the grail to your lips and quaff the potion... ...And instantly wish you hadn't! Ackkk! The stuff tastes like green cough syrup! Blechh! It isn't mixing well with the Double Dragon Blombs that you had with dinner either! What a fool you were for believing that little wretch. "Special Adventurer" indeed! If you ever get your hands on... Wait, what's this? What's happening? Your vision is filled with strange lights and colors. You feel like you're being teleported! You wake up in a dark place.

fields.name: a dimly lit room. (E)
fields.description: You are in a dimly lit room. The walls are bare rock with strange designs engraved in them. You can see torchlight to the east, which is your only exit.

fields.name: an E/W tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a plain tunnel. You can hear a faint noise far to the east.

fields.name: an E/W by north intersection.
fields.description: To the east and west are narrow tunnels. To the north you see torchlight, but can't make out any details. You can hear what sounds like a harmonica being played to the east.

fields.name: a narrow E/W tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a narrow east/west tunnel. The floor is covered with a strange red slippery substance. To the east you see a room, to the west is an intersection. The harmonica sound to the east is steadily growing louder.

fields.name: a small room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small room with quartz walls. The air is humid, and you hear harmonica music playing. You notice a large, door-sized chunk of quartz which could probably be removed with the right tool.

fields.name: a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: To the north you smell flowers, to the east is an archway, to the west you can see what appears to be sunlight and south is an intersection.

fields.name: the dining hall. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a very large dining hall. A huge table spans the length of the room. Ancient paintings adorn the tile ceiling. To the north you see a small corridor, to the east a small room.

fields.name: the kitchen. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small room with stone tile floors and shiny metallic counters which are bolted to the floor. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: a N/S corridor.
fields.description: You are in a north/south corridor. To the south is a large dining hall, to the north the corridor continues out of sight.

fields.name: a N/S corridor with rooms E/W.
fields.description: You are in a north/south corridor. To the east and west you see small rooms which were probably once guest rooms.

fields.name: the east guest room. (S/W)
fields.description: You are in a small room with limestone floors and marble walls. You see a small door to the south, probably a closet. A dusty old painting adorns the wall.

fields.name: a closet. (N)
fields.description: You are in a small closet with a mystical inscription carved into the stone wall. The exit is to the north.

fields.name: the west guest room. (E)
fields.description: You are in what was probably once a guest room. The floor is covered with a thin film of algae and the walls are covered with a dense moss. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: a N/S corridor with a tunnel east. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in a north/south corridor. The corridor continues to the north and the south. To the east you see a large, dark tunnel.

fields.name: an E/W tunnel.
fields.description: All sides of the tunnel are composed of rough rock. To the west is a corridor, to the east you see a chamber.

fields.name: a large chamber. (N/W)
fields.description: You are in a rather large chamber with a small trickle of water flowing from a hole in the wall. The walls are a pale green color, with flecks of silver spread throughout. To the west and north are tunnels.

fields.name: a N/S tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a very tight north/south tunnel. You hear faint humming to the north.

fields.name: a very large room. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large room with smooth, shiny black walls. You can hear water flowing, but can't see it. Exits go in all directions. You can hear some sort of humming sound to the north.

fields.name: a small room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small room with a crude wooden floor, and a stone fireplace which has glowing ashes within. An inscription on the wall says "KILROY WAS HERE." The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: the cold storage room. (E)
fields.description: You are in a very cold room which is probably used to store food. You see blood stains on the floor. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: an immense room. (S)
fields.description: You are in a room which is so large that you cannot see to the other side. There is a very wide and deep chasm to the north. A human skeleton lies in one corner. A loud humming noise is coming from the north.

fields.name: a N/S corridor. (N/S/E)
fields.description: To the north you see the end of the corridor. To the east is an entrance to what looks like a rickety elevator.

fields.name: an old elevator. (W/U/D)
fields.description: You are in an old rickety elevator. It groans under your weight and the rotted old cables could probably give way at any moment. You see a control panel on it which appears to take a key. Somebody has removed the cover.

fields.name: the end of a tunnel. (S)
fields.description: You are at the north end of a very long north south corridor. A sign on the wall says, "DEAD END".

fields.name: the bottom of a pit. (E)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of a very deep pit which has steep smooth walls (you can't possibly climb out.) You can see clear blue sky above you. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: the garden. (S)
fields.description: You are in a gigantic garden. The very walls, floor, and roof are covered with vegetation. The different colors blend together to create an almost hypnotic effect. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: a secret treasure room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small damp cave that was carved out of rough rock. Whoever tunneled this room did a fine job, as the walls all meet at perfect angles.

fields.name: an immense room. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a room which is so large that you cannot see to the other side. There is a very wide and deep chasm to the south. To the north you hear the humming of many machines.

fields.name: the master control room. (S)
fields.description: You are in a large room that is painted bright white. Various computer screens show different parts of the cave. A large shiny panel is set in the middle of the west wall. You also notice a large mass of equipment in the center of the room.

fields.name: a small room. (E)
fields.description: You are in a wide room with a very low ceiling. So low, that you have to crouch down to stand.

fields.name: a dusty storage room. (D)
fields.description: You are in a room which apparently hasn't been entered for ages. You can barely keep from choking on the dust cloud which appears every time you move.

fields.name: pearl
fields.description: In the center of the room you see a large, glowing black pearl.

fields.name: painting
fields.description: It is a rather expensive looking painting enclosed in a solid gold frame.

fields.name: diamond
fields.description: In the darkness you see a huge diamond glowing brightly.

fields.name: Sony TV
fields.description: You see a square shaped object in the room. It's a television set. But wait... This is no ordinary TV -- this is a Sony! (And that's no baloney!)

fields.name: scroll
fields.description: In the corner of the room lies a small parchment scroll with a ribbon around it.

fields.name: lead box
fields.description: On the floor of the chamber lies a small lead box.

fields.name: miner's pick
fields.description: A miner's pick is lying in the dust.

fields.name: dagger
fields.description: In the dim light you see a small dagger with jewels in the handle.

fields.name: crucifix
fields.description: On a mound of dust, you see a small silver crucifix.

fields.name: helmet
fields.description: On a pedestal in the center of the room, you see a chromium helmet with odd wires and lights covering its surface. Some inner wisdom tells you that it is used to control others' minds.

fields.name: magic club
fields.description: You see a very large magical club.

fields.name: spear
fields.description: You see an old spear.

fields.name: knobberry
fields.description: You see the troll's weapon, a beat-up old knobberry.

fields.name: foil
fields.description: You see a fair quality fencing foil.

fields.name: meat cleaver
fields.description: You see a butcher's meat cleaver.

fields.name: potion
fields.description: You see a grail which contains a green bubbling potion within. It is almost identical to the one that held the potion which brought you here, except that this one is plastic. A label reads, "RETURN TO SENDER".

fields.name: inscription
fields.description: Try reading the inscription

fields.name: a secret passage east
fields.description: The rock crumbles easily under the pick, and after a short while reveals a doorway. You notice a spring mechanism which could have opened it (and saved you some trouble), but who has time for such nonsense?

fields.name: door-sized chunk of quartz
fields.description: You'll need some kind of mining tool to break it away.

fields.name: Eccentric
fields.description: You see a beautiful longsword. It is very light, yet extremely sturdy and sharp. It looks as if it has been polished quite frequently. It has "Eccentric" inscribed upon the blade.

fields.name: harmonica
fields.description: You see a cheap harmonica. It says "Toys-R-Us" on it. A.J. says, "Can you believe I found this in a securely locked box? It's cool and all, but who would hide it in the treasure room?"

fields.name: piece of paper
fields.description: You see a folded piece of paper with some writing on it.

fields.name: plaid pants
fields.description: A.J.'s body vanishes in a giant explosion of fire and brimstone, leaving a pair of smoking trousers behind.

fields.name: crystal bridge
fields.description: As you play the harmonica, a slab of crystal begins to slide across the chasm. You continue playing until it stops grinding and see that a bridge now spans the chasm.

fields.name: battery-powered torch
fields.description: You see a fake torch made out of plastic. It seems to have fresh batteries, and would last for quite a while should you need it.

fields.name: empty treasure chests
fields.description: You see several old oak chests which once held treasure. They have all been smashed open and looted by a previous visitor. "Edgar took all the treasure with him." A.J. informs you.

fields.name: life support equipment
fields.description: You see a ghastly mess of wires and vacuum tubes which are connected to the tank through a series of hoses and wires. This appears to be The Mind's life support system.

fields.name: smashed equipment
fields.description: You see broken remains of The Mind's life support equipment.

fields.name: panel to the west
fields.description: The panel is the door for some sort of giant cupboard or something. It looks like it could be forced open.

fields.name: crate of potions
fields.description: You see a large packing crate. It is overflowing with grails that are identical to the one which held the magic potion that brought you here.

fields.name: skeleton
fields.description: It seems that right before this poor fellow died, he managed to carve a crude music note into the wall.

fields.name: potion dispenser
fields.description: You see a large vending machine. Instead of soda or candy, this machine dispenses bubbling green potions which bring adventurers to the Cave of The Mind. A sign says, "OUT OF ORDER".

fields.name: Cylon's feet
fields.description: Amidst the scalding hot puddle of metal stand the Cylon's feet. They are still intact up to his knees, and a bunch of wires are sticking out.

fields.name: silver key
fields.description: You see a large silver key lying on the floor. It appears as if somebody has dropped it.

fields.name: control panel
fields.description: The cover has been removed and it looks as if several adventurers have already tried to hotwire the thing. None seem to have succeeded. The only way to operate this death trap is by first turning it on with a key.

fields.name: silver coins
fields.description: You see a moldy old bag which contains around 5,000 silver coins!

fields.name: ruby ring
fields.description: You see a lovely gold ring with a giant ruby set in it. It doesn't appear magical, but is still very valuable.

fields.name: dead troll
fields.description: Before you lies the smelly corpse of the creature which bore striking resemblance to a troll.

fields.name: dead snake
fields.description: You see the motionless snake.

fields.name: dead wizard
fields.description: The body of the old wizard lies before you.

fields.name: dead flytrap
fields.description: You see the dead foliage of the Venus flytrap.

fields.name: dead cyclops
fields.description: You see nasty remains of the horribly ugly cyclops. It looks a bit better now.

fields.name: dead fencer
fields.description: Before you lies the body of the fencing master, his body frozen in one last feint.

fields.name: dead chef
fields.description: You see the large body of your dead friend, the chef.

fields.name: dead bat
fields.description: You see the dead bat. Blood has colored his little tuxedo red.

fields.name: dead Cylon
fields.description: You see the Cylon robot, its red eye is no longer moving.

fields.name: dead woman
fields.description: You see the cadaver of the woman.

fields.name: A.J.'s body
fields.description: You see A.J.'s body.

fields.name: The Mind's body
fields.description: You see the remains of the giant dead brain, covered in sticky fluid and shattered bits of glass.

fields.name: destroyed robot
fields.description: You see the little robot man lying here with a huge smoking dent in his forehead.

fields.name: dead dwarves
fields.description: You a disgusting pile of dead dwarves here.

fields.text: After reading those wise words, you feel stronger! Unfortunately you feel stronger because all your weapons have vanished, and your load is lighter...
"This entitles the owner to one free Cyber-Bit, should the owner leave the cave alive."

As you open the box, a flash of light explodes from it. The room fills with smoke and you hear a booming voice say, "Beware! Beware!"  "Beware what?" you ask. "Beware my magical spell, TRILDER!" the booming voice replies.
Congratulations! You have found the secret message for this adventure.
A booming voices from the north yells, "HALT! The next person to step through the door will be melted by my new Insta-Melt (tm) heat ray! Don't come any closer! I mean it!"

As the Cylon approaches the door a small device pops out of the floor behind him. A searing ray bursts forth from it melting him instantly. Fortunately the ray became so hot that the device melted itself in the process.
"No, please! Stop!" The Mind pleads, "I'll die! Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh! Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh! Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!" Its screams of anguish give you a bigger headache than A.J.'s harmonica.
As you approach the door a small device pops out of the floor behind you. A searing ray bursts forth from it killing you in a horribly painful way!
As you start to descend, the elevator starts making such horrible grinding noises that you fearfully switch it off. Something is blocking the shaft, and you'll only be able to travel up.

When your sight returns you find yourself at the very spot where you first drank the little man's potion. You pick yourself up and return to the Main Hall to order a much-deserved Double-Dragon Blomb.
Your friend, the Chef happily gets a job working in the kitchen of the Main Hall. Saying, if he can make a meal which pleases a giant brain then he can cook for anybody. Nobody argues with him.
A.J. hangs around the Main Hall for a few days, then leaves to go rafting on the dangerous Zyphur River. He does not return.
"HEY!! I WAS WATCHING THAT!" screams the old wizard in a sudden rage.
Congratulations, you've won a free Cyber-Bit. Unfortunately we are currently out of them, but you can have a leftover "Autobot" symbol instead.

The voice again booms at you, "So it still has a few bugs, I'd like to see you build a better one! Now see if you can defeat my foot-soldiers!" A panel then opens up and a troop of dwarves in plate mail armor charge at you.

fields.name: Troll
fields.description: Before you stands a very nasty looking troll-like creature wielding a large knobberry. He is obviously not a friend.

fields.name: Snake
fields.description: From the corner of the room slithers a gigantic snake with needle-like fangs. You notice a curious lump half way down his length which moves and emits mewling cries of anguish.

fields.name: Wizard
fields.description: You see an old man, probably a one-time wizard. His clothing is old and faded, and he has a glazed look in his eyes. He is sitting on a stool, watching television.

fields.name: Venus Flytrap
fields.description: Upon entering you see a rather unusual Venus flytrap. The unusual thing about it being its size. Its six-foot palps snap nervously open and shut.

fields.name: Cyclops
fields.description: Before you stands the most terrifying sight you have ever seen. He has one gigantic eye, two holes for nostrils, and a V-shaped drooling mouth filled with rotten snaggly teeth. In his two thumbed hand is a huge magic club.

fields.name: Fencing Master
fields.description: You see a man in full fencing garb. A patch on his uniform says "Swedish Fencing team -- 1977". He carries a foil which flickers in the candlelight as he makes his feints.

fields.name: Chef
fields.description: You see a large jolly man wearing a chef's hat. He's so friendly that you barely notice the huge meat cleaver he is holding, the strange light in his eyes, and the blood stains on his apron. He says he has been forced to cook for "The Mind".

fields.name: Vampire Bat
fields.description: As you enter you notice a bat hanging quietly from the cavern roof. You are struck by the fact that it appears to be wearing a black & white tuxedo and a cape. It wakes up suddenly and says, "Good evening!" in a Hungarian accent.

fields.name: Cylon
fields.description: Before you stands a robot-like creature with shiny metallic skin and glowing red eye that roves back and forth in a slit. He is advancing toward you.

fields.name: Woman
fields.description: Before you stands a beautiful woman with waxen skin, long dark hair, glowing eyes, and ruby lips. She smiles alluringly at you, showing two pointed teeth.

fields.name: A.J.
fields.description: You see a friendly, dark haired fellow in plaid pants. He was sitting on an empty chest, playing a harmonica. He explains that he came here with a fellow named "Edgar the Eccentric" who accidentally left him behind.

fields.name: The Mind
fields.description: You see a giant brain, 6 feet wide and 12 feet long encased in a liquid filled glass tank. Extending from the tank are a tangle of robot arms and legs which it scuttles about on. A giant speaker is mounted on it as well.

fields.name: Little Robot Man
fields.description: You see the little man who gave you the magic potion which brought you here. He stands perfectly still and stares ahead blankly. A trail of wires running from his forehead to a plug in the wall seem to indicate that he's some sort of robot.

fields.name: Dwarf
fields.description: You see some dwarves in plate mail. They all have the same crazy look in their eyes, as if their minds are being controlled.

fields.question: Cave of the Mind -- Magic word
Cave of the Mind -- How do I break the quartz wall?
Cave of the Mind -- Help! My weapons vanished!
Cave of the Mind -- How do I work the elevator?
Cave of the Mind -- What do I do with the helmet?
Cave of the Mind -- Can I cross the chasm?
Cave of the Mind -- How do I survive the heat ray?
Cave of the Mind -- How do I defeat The Mind?
Cave of the Mind -- How do I get out of here?
Cave of the Mind -- For your amusement...

fields.answer: Once you have found and opened the lead box, you may SAY TRILDER at any time to be teleported to a random location. This is useful if you are being hurt faster than you can heal, as nobody (friend or foe) will follow you.
Look around for a proper tool...
Preferably a MINER'S PICK. Now simply USE it.
They have just been scattered about the cave. Go search for them.
You need the proper key. Once you have a key, USE it.
USE it of course. Preferably on the Cylon because he will become your friend and you need his help to escape the cave.
Yes. Did you examine the skeleton?
USE the helmet on the Cylon and he will take the blast for you.
Did you pay attention to the room description?
Once you defeat The Mind, break open the western panel, go west, get the key, USE the key in the elevator, go up, get the potion and drink it.
For your amusement, have you tried to...
...GET the TV while the old wizard is watching it?
...USE the helmet on the Cylon several times? (He'll do four different things.) Or USE the helmet on The Mind?
